item.title: Tea stall help (TESTSCAPE!)
item.dc:creator: @NojTB NojTB
item.description:
@NojTB wrote:

the only
“switch (objectID) {”
i can find is just before woodcutting (its testscape)
testscape does not have /*OBJECT CLICK
any number!
i say this in all my threads and it doesent seem to help…[br][size=1]Posted on: May 26, 2007, 10:36:34 PM[/size][hr]by the way this is one part of the code asactly. id ont see no case infront of it…

if (objectID == 2562) // Ardy Theiving Stall (Gem) { actionAmount++; 
				if (actionTimer == 0)
				{
                      if((playerLevel[17]) <= 92)
                      {
                           sendMessage("You need to be level 93 theiving to steal from this table.");
                      }

                      else if((playerLevel[17]) >= 92)
                      {
                           sendMessage("You attempt to steal from the table...");
                           actionName = "93theiftable";
                           actionTimer = 10;
                      }       
                      else if(actionTimer >= 1) 
                      {
                           sendMessage("You have to wait before you steal from the table again.");
                      }                                          
			    }
		    }
	    if (actionName.equalsIgnoreCase("93theiftable"))
	{
		sendMessage("You steal from the table!");
		addSkillXP((3000*playerLevel[17]), 17);
		addItem(Item.randomTheif93tableitem(), 1);
		actionName = "";
	}</blockquote>

item.title: Tea stall help (TESTSCAPE!)
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

No no no

Replace that code with this.

[code]case 635: // Varrock teastall
actionAmount++;

				if (actionTimer == 0)
				{
                      if((playerLevel[17]) <= 0)
                      {
                           sendMessage("You need to be level 0 theiving to steal from the tea stall.");
                      }

                      else if((playerLevel[17]) >= 0)
                      {
                           sendMessage("You attempt to steal from the tea stall");
                           actionName = "spice";
                           actionTimer = 30;
                      }       
                      else if(actionTimer >= 1) 
                      {
                           sendMessage("You have to wait before you can steal from the spice stall again.");
                      }                                          
			   }
		   }
	   if (actionName.equalsIgnoreCase("spice"))
	{
		sendMessage("This stall has been taken out of the game...");
		addSkillXP((20*playerLevel[17]), 17);
		addItem(712, 1);
		actionName = "";

break;[/code]

You use case for clicking

And now you might beed to move under /OBJECT CLICK ONE/ And right under the line switch(objectID) {

Hope I helped

Read full topic

item.title: Tea stall help (TESTSCAPE!)
item.dc:creator: @NojTB NojTB
item.description:
@NojTB wrote:

Hey im trying to get the tea stall to work (if ya cen send me link to the pickpocketing part of theving so i can add it)
so i added this in wth all the other spice stalls. (TESTSCAPE!!!)

i get no errors but it doesent work.

[code]if (objectID == 635) // Varrock teastall
{
actionAmount++;

				if (actionTimer == 0)
				{
                      if((playerLevel[17]) <= 0)
                      {
                           sendMessage("You need to be level 0 theiving to steal from the tea stall.");
                      }

                      else if((playerLevel[17]) >= 0)
                      {
                           sendMessage("You attempt to steal from the tea stall");
                           actionName = "spice";
                           actionTimer = 30;
                      }       
                      else if(actionTimer >= 1) 
                      {
                           sendMessage("You have to wait before you can steal from the spice stall again.");
                      }                                          
			    }
		    }
	    if (actionName.equalsIgnoreCase("spice"))
	{
		sendMessage("This stall has been taken out of the game...");
		addSkillXP((20*playerLevel[17]), 17);
		addItem(712, 1);
		actionName = "";
	}[/code]

it should.

so does anyone got a code to get the tea stalls work in testscape?
